TopicTitle: Can we delete our own threads/topics ?

Articles.Content:
HI!

Nope, but you can ask one of the moderators to close it for you. As far as I know threads cannot be deleted only closed.

MJ
You can only delete it if there are no replies, I think.

Moved to the Kerbal Network, the forum to discuss the forum.

Forum users can delete their own posts but not started threads. Moderators can delete threads, but we generally only do so at OP request and when there are no replies.

I saw the thread in S&DD that you were looking to have deleted, got it for you.
